sentences.en: Am I at risk because of some incident in my sexual past?
sentences.cn: 我过去性生活中的某件事会使我处于危险境地吗？

sentences.en: Grundy lost his job in the fallout from the incident.
sentences.cn: 格伦迪受该事件影响丢了工作。

sentences.en: He detailed a constable to take it to the Incident Room.
sentences.cn: 他派了一名警察把它送到重案调查室。

sentences.en: His abhorrence of racism led him to write The Algiers Motel Incident.
sentences.cn: 对种族主义的憎恨促使他写了《阿尔及尔汽车旅馆事件》一书。

sentences.en: His bad behaviour was just an isolated incident.
sentences.cn: 他的不良行为只是个别事件。

sentences.en: It's not clear whether the incident was an accident or deliberate.
sentences.cn: 还不清楚这起事件是意外还是蓄意所为。

sentences.en: Julie was suspended from her job shortly after the incident.
sentences.cn: 出事后不久，朱莉就被停职了。

sentences.en: Roads were sealed off because of a major incident.
sentences.cn: 因为发生重大事故，道路被封锁了。

sentences.en: Stewart was foaming at the mouth about an incident the previous afternoon.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特正为头天下午的事件而大发脾气。
那次事件引发了这件事。

sentences.en: The idea that she witnessed this shameful incident meant nothing to him.
sentences.cn: 虽然她目睹了这可耻的一幕，但是这对他来说无关紧要。

sentences.en: The incident took place about 500 yards from where he was standing.
sentences.cn: 事件发生在距他所站位置大约500码远的地方。

sentences.en: The incident was reported to the prison governor.
sentences.cn: 这一事件已汇报给监狱长。

sentences.en: The incident was the latest in a string of attacks.
sentences.cn: 这是一连串袭击事件中最近的一起。

sentences.en: The pictures provide irrefutable evidence of the incident.
sentences.cn: 这些照片为这起事件提供了不容辩驳的证据。

sentences.en: The police have launched an investigation into the incident.
sentences.cn: 警方已对该事件展开调查。

sentences.en: We have viewed the video recording of the incident.
sentences.cn: 我们看过了该事件的录像。

sentences.en: We know of the incident but have no further details.
sentences.cn: 我们听说过这件事，但对详情不是很清楚。
